ygData.subject: RE: Chain vs. snare
ygData.msgSnippet: LOL no it doesn t start with a J.  but you seemed to want an opinion from someone higher from how i read it, and you just seem stubborn =P so what i am trying
ygData.messageBody:
LOL no it doesn't start with a J. but you seemed to want an opinion from
someone higher from how i read it, and you just seem stubborn =P

so what i am trying to get across is that i felt exactly the same as you.
hopefully you will see there is another perspective, and maybe it is better
and you will learn more you encounter it more often. i think that's all we
are trying to say.

Shada D'ukal, Level 50 Bard, Mithaniel Marr
Erisi Dlarit, Level 21 Paladin, Mithaniel Marr
